Meta_Tags.title: Filo | Wallet Finder
Meta_Tags.keywords: filo-tag, filo, technology, bluetooth-device, device, filo tag, how it works
Meta_Tags.description:
Attach it. Ring it. Find it.
Attach Filo to all your personal objects to find them through a very simple mobile app.

Blocks.title: The handy bluetooth wallet tracker
Blocks.description:
Drop Filo into your wallet and use Filoâ€™s wallet tracker app to find your wallet by sound or last know position based on low energy bluetooth technology.

The days looking endlessly for your wallet are gone thanks to Filo.
